description: A state of the art bionic implant go beyond a basic instinctual knowledge about the operation of flying machines.  This sophisticated CBM also grants superior spotting ability as well as an integrated CAD interface which allows for near infinite customization to virtually any flying machine.

A state of the art bionic implant go beyond a basic instinctual knowledge about the operation of flying machines.  This sophisticated CBM also grants superior spotting ability as well as an integrated CAD interface which allows for near infinite customization to virtually any flying machine.
A  bionic implant that is effectively an integrated personal computer built into the left arm.

A  bionic implant that is effectively an integrated personal computer built into the right arm.
A rather large CBM that mounts within the torso.  The bionic device allows the fall from any height walk away unscathed, as well as providing a slight increase in general dexterity.
